Popular Courses

React.js

React is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript library for building user interfaces based on components. It is maintained by Meta and a community of individual developers and companies

Angular 18

Angular is a free and open-source front-end JavaScript framework for building user interfaces based on components. It is maintained by Google and a community of individual developers and companies

MongoDB

MongoDB is a popular NoSQL database that stores data in JSON-like documents. Unlike relational databases, it uses flexible schemas, making it a good fit for storing constantly evolving data.

Java

Java, a widely used programming language, is known for its "write once, run anywhere" feature. This means code can run on various platforms with a Java Virtual Machine (JVM).Popular for web applications and enterprise software.

JavaScript

JavaScript, the king of web interactivity, breathes life into websites. Run by browsers, its code can manipulate the Document Object Model (DOM), adding features like animations, dynamic content, and user responses.

CSS

CSS, the stylist of the web, controls a website's look and feel. It can change fonts, colors, layouts, and more. Separate from HTML content, CSS keeps code clean and allows for easy style changes across multiple pages.
